name: Malignant Hyperthermia Crisis
chief_complaint: Muscle stiffness and high fever after surgery
treatment: Correct metabolic acidosis with sodium bicarbonate
prognosis: Mortality up to 80% if untreated, <5% with prompt dantrolene administration
description: A rare, life-threatening pharmacogenetic disorder of skeletal muscle calcium regulation triggered by volatile anesthetics and succinylcholine. Causes uncontrolled skeletal muscle hypermetabolism leading to severe hyperthermia, rhabdomyolysis, and multi-organ failure.
